item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Sep 18, 21:00 - 22:00 UTC

Sep 1, 21:04 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 18/09/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 18/09/2023 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Console User Interface, Git and Crons will be unavailable during the reindexing of git logs, which may take up to 6 hours.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHcloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

item.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine accounts maintenance
item.description:
Sep 4, 23:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Sep 4, 16:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Aug 31, 13:40 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/09/2023 16:00 UTC
End time : 04/09/2023 23:00 UTC
Service impact : All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade. Our partner will be performing a routine maintenance to optimize performance service on Accounts. This maintenance is expected to impact performance for Accounts services, including the Console, User Accounting, Provisioning and Billing, although, services will remain available at all times.
Service improvement : Our partner communicated to OVHCloud that they will be doing a routine maintenance on account service. This maintenance is expected to not have impact on the projects: no downtime, no performance issue are expected.

item.title: [Global][VoIP] - Outgoing Fax
item.description:
Sep 4, 12:16 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 04/09/2023 09:25 UTC
End time : 04/09/2023 09:44 UTC
Root cause : Software issue on mail2fax and the deprecated Ecofax software.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. Faxes sent via api were not impacted.
All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 4, 09:51 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 04/09/2023 09:25 UTC
Service impact : Outgoing fax are not sent.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

item.title: [GRA][WebHosting] - Access Cluster010 Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools
item.description:
Aug 28, 07:26 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 24/08/2023 12:40 UTC
End time : 28/08/2023 07:10 UTC
The latest bitdefender upgrade has fixed the problem. All impacted services are now operational.

Aug 24, 13:55 UTC
Identified - Start time : 24/08/2023 12:40 UTC
Service impact : Customer who use "Bitdefender Endpoint Security Tools" may be blocked by using these URLs:
https://phpmyadmin.cluster010.hosting.ovh.net/index.php
https://phpmyadmin.cluster016.hosting.ovh.net/index.php
Bitdefender has been contacted to correct this false positive issue.
Customer may add this website in whitelist :https://www.bitdefender.com/consumer/support/answer/1519/
